data.comment: Today's referee, Rafael Traci, has blown to start the match.
Rafael Traci signals a Gremio throw-in in Sao Paulo's half.
In the minute 2, Free kick Sao Paulo.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo in the half of Gremio.
Corner awarded to Sao Paulo.
In the minute 6, Gremio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Sao Paulo to check on Pepe, who is grimacing with pain.
Pepe has recovered and rejoins the match in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 10, In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Luciano for Sao Paulo gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Rafael Traci awards Gremio a goal kick.
In the minute 11, Sao Paulo to take a throw-in in Gremio territory.
Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Sao Paulo.
Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
In the minute 13, Rafael Traci awards the home team a throw-in.
Sao Paulo's Brenner breaks free at Morumbí. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Gremio have a goal kick.
In the minute 15, Free kick for Gremio in their own half.
Throw-in for Gremio in their own half.
Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
In the minute 17, Sao Paulo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sao Paulo's Bruno Alves misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Gremio at Morumbí.
In the minute 20, Gremio push forward at Morumbí and Maicon gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Sao Paulo defence.
Rafael Traci waits before resuming play because Reinaldo for Sao Paulo is still down.
Gremio have been awarded a corner by Rafael Traci.
In the minute 23, It's a goal kick for the home team in Sao Paulo.
Reinaldo returns to the field for Sao Paulo after picking up a slight injury.
Corner awarded to Gremio.
In the minute 25, Luis Orejuela gets his shot on target but fails to score for Gremio.
Free kick for Sao Paulo in the half of Gremio.
Free kick for Gremio in their own half.
In the minute 27, In Sao Paulo Gremio attack through Pepe. The finish is off target, however.
Gremio have been awarded a corner by Rafael Traci.
Pedro Geromel (Gremio) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 27, Ball goes out of play for a Sao Paulo goal kick.
Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Gremio.
Gremio awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 31, In Sao Paulo Gremio's Bruno Cortes is caught offside.
Can Gremio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sao Paulo's half?
Sao Paulo needs to be cautious. Gremio have an attacking throw-in.
Gremio’s Alisson is on his feet again at Morumbí.
Gremio pushes forward through Matheus Henrique, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 33, The match at Morumbí has been interrupted briefly for a check on Alisson, who is down injured.
In the minute 34, Sao Paulo awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball goes out of play for a Sao Paulo goal kick.
In the minute 35, Important block from the Sao Paulo defence as Alisson fires in a strike for Gremio.
Gremio have been awarded a corner by Rafael Traci.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 38, Free kick for Gremio in their own half.
Can Gremio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sao Paulo's half?
Rafael Traci awards Sao Paulo a goal kick.
In the minute 41, Sao Paulo are coming forward and Bruno Alves gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Gremio at Morumbí.
Rafael Traci signals a Gremio throw-in in Sao Paulo's half.
In the minute 41, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Sao Paulo in their own half.
Throw-in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 44, Free kick for Sao Paulo in the half of Gremio.
Free kick Gremio.
In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 45, 3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Maicon of Gremio gets in a strike, but is off target.
Sao Paulo have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Rafael Traci awards Gremio a goal kick.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo at Morumbí.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 46, Rafael Traci has blown to start the second-half.
Ball safe as Gremio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Gremio to take a throw-in in Sao Paulo territory.
In the minute 47, Igor Gomes of Sao Paulo smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Free kick for Gremio in their own half.
Sao Paulo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Gremio in the half of Sao Paulo.
Luiz Fernando for the away team is judged to be offside.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo in the half of Gremio.
In the minute 50, Throw-in for Gremio at Morumbí.
In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Gremio's Walter Kannemann gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 52, It's a goal kick for the home team in Sao Paulo.
At Morumbí, Pedro Geromel has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Goal kick for Sao Paulo at Morumbí.
In the minute 54, Rafael Traci signals a throw-in for Gremio, close to Sao Paulo's area.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Gremio close to the penalty box.
Gremio's Pedro Geromel breaks free at Morumbí. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 55, Sao Paulo have a goal kick.
Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
Reinaldo for Sao Paulo is whistled offside.
In the minute 56, Rafael Traci awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Gremio goal kick.
Attention is being given to Gremio’s Luiz Fernando and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 58, Luiz Fernando for Gremio is back on the field again.
Maicon for Gremio gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Rafael Traci awards Sao Paulo a goal kick.
In the minute 58, Alisson is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
The away team has substituted Alisson with Thaciano. Renato Gaucho is thus making his first change.
Ball safe as Sao Paulo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 61, Sao Paulo are pushing forward but Luciano's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Gremio at Morumbí.
Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
Free kick Gremio.
In the minute 62, Igor Gomes (Sao Paulo) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Gremio.
Free kick for Gremio in the half of Sao Paulo.
In the minute 63, Dani Alves (Sao Paulo) has received a first yellow card.
Luiz Fernando is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Sao Paulo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 65, Fernando Diniz (Sao Paulo) is making a first substitution, with Vitor Bueno replacing Igor Gomes.
Gremio awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 67, It seems as if Luiz Fernando is unable to continue. Ferreira replaces him for the away team.
Free kick for Sao Paulo in their own half.
Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
In the minute 70, Can Gremio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sao Paulo's half?
Sao Paulo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Gremio.
Gremio's Ferreira is on target but unsuccessful.
The away team have replaced Maicon with Lucas Silva. This is the third substitution made today by Renato Gaucho.
In the minute 72, The away team replace Isaque with Jean Pyerre.
Sao Paulo will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Gremio.
In the minute 73, Sao Paulo's Luan has been booked in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 75, Gremio's Jean Pyerre misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Sao Paulo goal kick.
Walter Kannemann for Gremio has been booked by Rafael Traci and receives a first yellow card.
Free kick for Gremio in their own half.
In the minute 77, Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Sao Paulo.
In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Sao Paulo in their own half.
Jonas Toro is replacing Gabriel for the home team.
In the minute 79, Fernando Diniz is making the team's third substitution at Morumbí with Paulinho replacing Brenner.
Throw-in Gremio.
In the minute 80, Vitor Bueno (Sao Paulo) gets a yellow card.
Free kick for Gremio in the half of Sao Paulo.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo in their own half.
In the minute 83, Sao Paulo are pushing forward but Jonas Toro's finish is wide of the goal.
Gremio have a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 84, Free kick in a good position for Sao Paulo!
Dani Alves of Sao Paulo gets in a strike, but is off target.
Rafael Traci awards Gremio a goal kick.
In the minute 88, Ball safe as Sao Paulo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Santiago Trellez is replacing Luciano for Sao Paulo at Morumbí.
Can Sao Paulo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Gremio's half?
In the minute 89, Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
Gremio to take a throw-in in Sao Paulo territory.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Sao Paulo.
Throw-in Gremio.
Free kick Gremio.
Gremio have been awarded a corner by Rafael Traci.
Corner awarded to Gremio.
Sao Paulo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
The match has come to a close in Sao Paulo. The final score is 0-0.
